thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Alessandro Bogoni
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Alessandro Bogoni

author: Alessandro Bogoni
title: Alessandro Bogoni
text: I usually buy stuff on Bangood.com and everything arrived. When I had problems, the customer service always solved any problem. I can say I'm fully satisfied of Bangood.com You give more value to your money and you can find things you can barely find on the market at a reasonable price in Europe. Try it, you won't regret :)
